mapper.select: SELECT b.borrow_nid, b.user_id, b.`name` AS borrow_name, u.username, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, b.borrow_style, bs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, b.project_type, bpt.borrow_name AS project_type_name, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, b.borrow_apr, FORMAT(b.borrow_account_yes, 2) AS borrow_account_yes, IF(b.repay_last_time IS NULL OR b.repay_last_time = '' OR b.repay_last_time='0' OR b.repay_last_time = 'null', '', FROM_UNIXTIME(b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS repay_last_time FROM huiyingdai_borrow b LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
